#REMARK SUMMARY
TITLE	Pyruvate: ferredoxin oxidoreductace (POR) 
BIOISIS_ID	1PORHP
EXP_DESCRIPTION	Pyruvate: ferredoxin oxidoreductace (POR) is a central player in the Pfu glycolytic pathway. A homologue has been crystallized however the known structure has more residues and is one chain in contrast to the Pfu complex.   Samples are native and data was collected under anaerobic conditions.  Data collection was stardardized with the use of known molecular weight protein standards thus confirming the molecular weight of the complex.
SOURCE_LOCATION	ALS BL 12.3.1
PUBLICATION	Not Submitted
